column1: #Text=The polycrystalline sample of Na0.5La0.5RuO3 was syn-thesized by solid-state reaction using Na2CO3 (dried in an oven at 120°C for 3 days before use), dry La2O3, and RuO2 (Alfa Aesar, 99.5%, 99.99%, and 99.95%, respectively) in stoichiometric ratios as starting materials.
#Text=Reagents were mixed thoroughly, placed in alumina crucibles, and heated in air at 900°C for 24 hours.
#Text=The resulting powder was re-ground and heated in air at 1000°C for 24 hours.
#Text=The phase purity and crystal structure were determined through pow-der x-ray diffraction (PXRD) using a Bruker D8 Advance Eco with Cu Kα radiation and a LynxEye-XE detector.
#Text=The crys-tal structure refinement based on the powder diffraction data was performed with GSAS29.
#Text=The crystal structure drawings were created by using the program VESTA30.
